snippet.title: In Requiem - New Oculus VR Experience Trailer
snippet.description:
Download it for FREE here: http://amzans.itch.io/in-requiem
Video trailer for our graduation project: In Requiem. Through this project we explored some of the new possibilities that VR enables as a narrative medium. 

Authors: Alberto Carrillo & Anthony Najjar
Voice Acting: Tom O'Bedlam
Universidad Veritas

More info soon!
